snippet: Nudists have been coming to Mazo Beach for decades, but they worry that their tenuous acceptance is being threatened by visitors who have been engaging in sex and using drugs.
abstract: Nudists have been coming to Mazo Beach in Mazomanie, Wis, for decades, but they worry that their tenuous public acceptance is being threatened by visitors who have been engaging in sex and using drugs.
lead_paragraph: Nudists have been coming to Mazo Beach for decades, but they worry that their tenuous acceptance is being threatened by visitors who have been engaging in sex and using drugs.

headline.main: On the Beach, in the Buff. In Wisconsin?
headline.print_headline: On the Beach, In the Buff. In Wisconsin?
